Articles.Content:
Hello there!

I've got that problem with procedural fairing 0.25:

- I can not choose the dimentions of this part anymore. As well as the other (the one witch allow you to make interstage).

Have you got the same issue?

Have you a solution?

Thanks!

Hello, It may be a silly question, sorry, but have you try to right click on this part when you have put it on your rocket?

Edit : And if you are on a career have you unlocked on the tech tree the others dimensions?

Edited November 28, 2014 by Malah

What do you you can't choose the dimensions? As Malah said, they're available in the tweakable menu in the editor, but if you mean the option to resize them is gone (big hole in the tweakable menu), then another mod with KSPAPIExtensions is interfering and should be updated.
